business_analysis.description:
**Business Summary of Manipal Fintech**

**Business Model:**
Manipal Fintech operates as a Gold-Tech Fintech platform, primarily offering gold loans with minimal paperwork. The company leverages technology to streamline loan processes, making them quick and accessible to a wide range of customers. They also provide services like balance transfer and gold loan at home.

**Industry:**
Manipal Fintech is part of the Financial Services industry, specifically within the Fintech sector. Their focus is on gold-backed lending, integrating technology to enhance service delivery and customer experience.

**Key Products/Services:**
- **Gold Loans:** Primary service offering quick gold loans with minimal paperwork.
- **Balance Transfer:** Allows customers to transfer their existing gold loans to Manipal Fintech for better terms.
- **Gold Loan at Home:** Provides doorstep services for gold loans, enhancing convenience for customers.

**Market Position:**
Manipal Fintech is positioned as India‚Äôs most trusted gold loans brand, backed by The Manipal Group. They have disbursed loans worth 16,000+ Cr to over 400,000 customers across India. Their reputation is built on trust, reliability, and innovative use of technology.

**Financial Information:**
- **Loans Disbursed:** 16,000+ Cr worth of loans.
- **Customer Base:** 400,000+ happy customers.
- **Company Size:** 201-500 employees.
- **Founded:** 2018.
- **Headquarters:** Gurugram, Haryana.

**Recent Developments:**
- **Rebranding:** Formerly known as SahiBandhu Fintech, the company rebranded to Manipal Fintech to reflect a broader business vision and future-focused strategy.
- **Technological Innovation:** Leveraging AI for gold loan assessment, biometric eKYC, and app-led loan management to enhance speed, reliability, and inclusivity.
- **Focus on Underserved Segments:** Targeting farmers, SMEs, and women-led businesses to empower communities across India.

**Leadership:**
- **CEO:** Puja Abhishek Singh, driving growth via business transformation and dedicated to positive societal impact.
- **Key Executives:** Ashish Choudhary (VP and Business Head - Strategic Relationships), Puneet Sharma (DVP - Software Development), Gaurav Srivastava (Chief Sales Officer).

**Conclusion:**
Manipal Fintech is a prominent player in the gold loan market in India, distinguished by its technological innovation and customer-centric approach. Backed by The Manipal Group, the company is well-positioned to continue its growth and expand its impact on financial inclusion across India.

Puja fosters a culture of inclusivity, ensuring every team member feels valued and heard. Her empathetic approach and ability to encourage team participation leave a lasting impression on everyone she works with. From a business perspective, Puja is sharp and decisive, with an exceptional ability to assess her team‚Äôs strengths and weaknesses. She strategically assigns tasks to maximize productivity and brings out the best in her team, driving outstanding results while motivating individuals to perform at their highest potential. Personally, I have always looked up to Puja for guidance and inspiration. Her leadership style has significantly influenced my approach to work and has set a benchmark for what great management looks like. She is truly a remarkable leader and an asset to any organization.‚Äù

detailed_profile.about: Hey, Thanks for visiting my profile. I have had quite a wonderful corporate journey so far with my range of experience varying from manufacturing industries(Building Materials, Consumer durables) to the Service industry (Financial Services) my role prima facie being to understand the business requirements and suggest/implement effective actionable on the same. In my 3 year journey, I have closely worked with the CEO, President, COO, and other key top management officials to learn the Strategy formation, decision-making process, priority matrix, project management, etc. I started with Somany Impresa Group in July 2021 in the New Business & Growth Strategy department. I was deeply involved in the group transformation processes, new business creation, and Group corporate dashboard & deck creation within the Group. Feel free to connect or share any career opportunity with me. Looking forward to our interaction

experience.description_html:
1. Program Manager: Insurance Go-Live
● Spearheaded the end-to-end go-to-market (GTM) strategy for a new insurance vertical, including
target segmentation, product positioning, and launch planning.
● Developed comprehensive program roadmaps with key milestones, deliverables, and cross-functional
execution timelines.
● Designed and implemented core operational processes (lead management, policy issuance, claims
handling) with integrated automation to enhance efficiency and system alignment.
2. Program Lead – Agent Engagement Pilot (PAN India)
● Designed and implemented a PAN India agent engagement framework, targeting priority segments
and high-potential regions.
● Led on-ground execution in Delhi and established monitoring mechanisms to track program
performance and engagement KPIs.
● Achieved 10% agent reactivation and 20% increase in business across 5 key states, driving measurable
growth for Manipal Fintech.
3. Lead – Bank Empanelment & Agreement Execution
● Acted as the primary liaison (SPOC) for Manipal Fintech partnerships with major banks, ensuring
end-to-end compliance and coordination.
● Successfully led the empanelment process with IDBI and Kotak Mahindra Bank, aligning with
regulatory and operational requirements.
● Supported agreement screening and negotiation with private banks in collaboration with C-suite
executives, ensuring favorable terms and risk mitigation.
4..Strategic Lead – New Business Ideation & Opportunity Mapping
● Created a structured ideation pipeline to systematically capture, assess, and prioritize new business
concepts.
● Conducted market potential analysis for identified ideas, evaluating feasibility, scalability, and alignment
with company objectives.
● Mapped opportunities for product portfolio expansion in unexplored segments, supporting long-term
growth strategy

experience.title: Assistant Manager

Strategy & Operations Associate ‚Äì Chairman‚Äôs Office Projects‚óè Developed corporate decks and dashboards for Chairman, investors, and board members, enablingdata-driven decisions.‚óè Contributed to new business ideation across sectors including packaging, building materials, andconsumer electronics.‚óè Supported PMO cost-saving initiatives, conducted vendor scouting and comparative analysis, andhandled data for e-auctions.‚óè Facilitated cross-division collaboration for process optimization and operational efficiency.
experience.description_html:
1. Project Lead – New Business Vertical Launch (Cookware)
● Conducted market research across key target geographies and gathered competitive intelligence to
inform strategic positioning.
● Led product portfolio creation, pricing analysis, and due diligence to validate market fit and financial
viability.
● Collaborated with C-suite to develop the GTM strategy and executed strategic sourcing for product
launch.
2. Regional SPOC – Distribution Excellence, East India
● Collected market intelligence and supported digital adoption across the regional sales ecosystem.
● Managed a 50-member sales team for 3 months; mapped 6000+ outlets and reactivated 70+ stores,
generating ₹1 Cr. in revenue.
● Assisted Growth Heads in reactivating dormant business zones and driving channel partner
performance.
3. Strategy & Operations Associate – Chairman’s Office Projects
● Developed corporate decks and dashboards for Chairman, investors, and board members, enabling
data-driven decisions.
● Contributed to new business ideation across sectors including packaging, building materials, and
consumer electronics.
● Supported PMO cost-saving initiatives, conducted vendor scouting and comparative analysis, and
handled data for e-auctions.
● Facilitated cross-division collaboration for process optimization and operational efficiency.

detailed_profile.name: Gaurav Srivastava
detailed_profile.position: Chief Sales Officer at Manipal Fintech- Gold Loans
detailed_profile.about: As the Chief Sales Officer at Manipal Fintech , I lead the sales organization to drive sustainable growth in the Gold loans , Credit cards , Revenue based financing , Personal Loans , Consumer Durables , BFSI segment. With over 20 years of experience in sales and marketing, I have a proven track record of building high-performance teams, launching new channels, and optimizing existing ones for maximum efficiency and customer satisfaction. I was also a co-founder of Elements of Decor, a startup in the home decor industry targeting the mass affluent segment. I launched the brand on an eCommerce marketplace, overseeing product selection, quality checks, and customer satisfaction. Additionally, I developed strategic partnerships with suppliers to ensure a diverse product range and competitive pricing. My expertise in business leadership, new business development, and business strategy has enabled me to achieve remarkable results in various sectors, including B2B, eCommerce, and online companies.

detailed_profile.name: Allan Fernandes
detailed_profile.position: IIM B | Ex PwC | Building the future of FinTech
detailed_profile.about: At Manipal FinTech, I've had the chance to apply modern technology to solve tangible business problems. We've launched 0-to-1 platforms from scratch, built an agent network that now drives over ‚Çπ15 Cr a month, and reimagined everything from onboarding to reconciliation. Presently I am leading the development of a commercial lending product with an AI underwriting model that has slashed approval times from weeks to days. This hands-on experience has fueled a deeper fascination with AI's potential. I am now deeply exploring the next frontier of this technology, experimenting with a suite of AI tools that can be used to build truly intelligent, adaptive financial systems. My journey to this point was built on a foundation of large-scale transformation. At Genpact and TCS, I led multi-million dollar programs for PwC UK's portfolio, reworked enterprise architectures, and boosted productivity that took invoice auto-posting from 10% to 60%. Beyond Work This forward-looking curiosity is balanced by a deep appreciation for the past. I'm an history and geopolitics enthusiast, fascinated by how global events shape the very institutions we build products for today. This also manifests in a more tangible form: I'm a numismatist, collecting stories of empires and trade, one coin at a time. As a curious traveler, I've explored over 20 countries, soaking in cultures and perspectives that constantly challenge my own. Whether it's a complex system, a historical event, or a new city, I'm always looking for the underlying patterns and the story waiting to be told. Let's connect.

positions.subtitle: Manipal Fintech
positions.description: Currently leading the product charter at Manipal FinTech (formerly Sahi Bandhu), where I‚Äôve built 0-to-1 digital platforms, scaled agent ecosystems, and redesigned mission-critical systems for onboarding, disbursal, and reconciliation. Key deliverablesLaunched a multi system Agent Lead generation Channel from scratch - scaled to 200+ field advisors within 3 months, generating over ‚Çπ15Cr ($2M+) in monthly disbursals.‚Ä¢ Built Doorstep Banking integration with a leading private bank - added ‚Çπ2Cr/month in new loan volumes; resolved a systemic penalty logic bug, preserving compliance and trust.‚Ä¢ Digitized onboarding through automated ID creation, KYC APIs, and workflow validation - reduced TAT from 2 hours to 45 mins, with 80% fewer errors.‚Ä¢ Re-architected disbursal and reconciliation engines for the in-house NBFC - cut daily ops from 6 hours to 2 hours (automation pipeline targeting 30 mins).‚Ä¢ Redesigned onboarding and disbursal flows, identifying key opportunities for AI-driven automation with the potential to reduce TAT by up to 70%‚Ä¢ Proposed a scalable redesign of the database schema - enabled cross-platform traceability, reduced latency, and simplified change management.‚Ä¢ Established agile product operations: implemented structured PRD workflows, built a centralized design system, and evangelized tools like Figma, Miro, and Notion.‚Ä¢ Built and managed a 7-member cross-functional team (PMs & Designers) - embedded sprint rituals, backlog hygiene, and GTM cadence with business and tech.
positions.title: Head of Product
positions.description_html:
Currently leading the product charter at Manipal FinTech (formerly Sahi Bandhu), where I’ve built 0-to-1 digital platforms, scaled agent ecosystems, and redesigned mission-critical systems for onboarding, disbursal, and reconciliation. Key deliverables

Launched a multi system Agent Lead generation Channel from scratch - scaled to 200+ field advisors within 3 months, generating over ₹15Cr ($2M+) in monthly disbursals.
• Built Doorstep Banking integration with a leading private bank - added ₹2Cr/month in new loan volumes; resolved a systemic penalty logic bug, preserving compliance and trust.
• Digitized onboarding through automated ID creation, KYC APIs, and workflow validation - reduced TAT from 2 hours to 45 mins, with 80% fewer errors.
• Re-architected disbursal and reconciliation engines for the in-house NBFC - cut daily ops from 6 hours to 2 hours (automation pipeline targeting 30 mins).
• Redesigned onboarding and disbursal flows, identifying key opportunities for AI-driven automation with the potential to reduce TAT by up to 70%
• Proposed a scalable redesign of the database schema - enabled cross-platform traceability, reduced latency, and simplified change management.
• Established agile product operations: implemented structured PRD workflows, built a centralized design system, and evangelized tools like Figma, Miro, and Notion.
• Built and managed a 7-member cross-functional team (PMs & Designers) - embedded sprint rituals, backlog hygiene, and GTM cadence with business and tech.

experience.title: UK IT Test Manager
experience.description: Deputed to PwC UK on the staff augmentation model (as a contractor) through TCS. Following were my responsibilities as PwC staff:‚Ä¢ Participate in creation of business cases for projects, engagement proposals for vendors, reviewing bids by vendors and vendor selection. ‚Ä¢ Review and/or manage the testing by implementing the goals and testing processes established by PwC.‚Ä¢ Organize and lead risk identification and risk analysis sessions and use the results of such sessions to review/for test estimation, planning, monitoring and control.‚Ä¢ Review, create and/or implement test plans consistent with organizational policies and test strategies.‚Ä¢ Continuously monitor and control the test activities to achieve project objectives.‚Ä¢ Assess and report relevant and timely test status to all stakeholders.‚Ä¢ Identify skills and resource gaps in test teams and participate in sourcing adequate resources.‚Ä¢ Propose a business case for test activities & tools which outlines the costs and benefits expected.‚Ä¢ Ensure proper communication within the test team and with other project stakeholders.‚Ä¢ Participate in and lead test process improvement initiatives.Managed multiple vendors and ensured zero defect delivery on 20+ PwC UK IT projects, with a net value ~ GBP 80M across the tax, assurance, consulting and IFS lines of serviceConducted sessions for risk identification, risk analysis, and mitigation strategiesValidated and signed off on vendor test strategiesInfluenced and suggested vital implementation plan changes leading to 40% cost reduction of the projectReduced 80% defects on the MicroStrategy programDeveloped an Agile (Scrum) test strategy for the programBuilt a dedicated 5-member BAT (Business Analyst and Testing) team by cross-training professionals
experience.description_html:
Deputed to PwC UK on the staff augmentation model (as a contractor) through TCS. Following were my responsibilities as PwC staff:

• Participate in creation of business cases for projects, engagement proposals for vendors, reviewing bids by vendors and vendor selection.
• Review and/or manage the testing by implementing the goals and testing processes established by PwC.
• Organize and lead risk identification and risk analysis sessions and use the results of such sessions to review/for test estimation, planning, monitoring and control.
• Review, create and/or implement test plans consistent with organizational policies and test strategies.
• Continuously monitor and control the test activities to achieve project objectives.
• Assess and report relevant and timely test status to all stakeholders.
• Identify skills and resource gaps in test teams and participate in sourcing adequate resources.
• Propose a business case for test activities & tools which outlines the costs and benefits expected.
• Ensure proper communication within the test team and with other project stakeholders.
• Participate in and lead test process improvement initiatives.

Managed multiple vendors and ensured zero defect delivery on 20+ PwC UK IT projects, with a net value ~ GBP 80M across the tax, assurance, consulting and IFS lines of service
Conducted sessions for risk identification, risk analysis, and mitigation strategies
Validated and signed off on vendor test strategies
Influenced and suggested vital implementation plan changes leading to 40% cost reduction of the project
Reduced 80% defects on the MicroStrategy program
Developed an Agile (Scrum) test strategy for the program
Built a dedicated 5-member BAT (Business Analyst and Testing) team by cross-training professionals

detailed_profile.name: HARIOM .
detailed_profile.position: Asst. Marketing Manager | SEO Strategist | Growth Marketing | Organic Marketing |
detailed_profile.about: Results-driven Assistant Marketing Manager with more than 6 years of experience leading 360¬∞ marketing initiatives across fintech, B2B, SaaS, and e-commerce sectors. Proven expertise in crafting and executing integrated strategies-spanning digital marketing, SEO (on-page, off-page, technical), ATL/BTL campaigns, events, and customer engagement, to drive brand growth and ROI. Adept at managing performance marketing, agency partnerships, and cross-functional teams, while leveraging automation, LLM tools, LSQ, and HubSpot for scalable marketing execution. Skilled in data-driven decision-making through GA4, GSC, SEMrush, and CRM insights. Known for driving measurable outcomes, mentoring teams, and consistently exceeding business KPIs.. I‚Äôve had the privilege of working with notable brands like Designhill, Jashn Foods, and Purever, consistently achieving exceptional outcomes and surpassing objectives. I thrive in dynamic environments and enjoy collaborating with teams to unlock new opportunities in the ever-evolving digital landscape. I am passionate about leveraging AI, cutting-edge tools, and product strategies to drive the growth of SaaS and PaaS businesses. My expertise lies in blending data-driven insights with innovative strategies to create impactful solutions that deliver measurable results. With a deep understanding of AI-driven tools and platforms, I excel in identifying growth opportunities, optimizing workflows, and enhancing user experiences. My proficiency in tools like Figma, FigJam, Trello, Miro, and Adobe Creative Suite enables me to craft intuitive designs and prototypes that resonate with the target audience. Additionally, my experience in SEO, SMM, UI/UX Optimization, and performance marketing ensures a holistic approach to product growth.

positions.description_html:
At Manipal Fintech, I lead the Marketing team, focusing on SEO, social media marketing (SMM), and performance marketing. My role encompasses devising and implementing strategies to drive visibility, engagement, and traffic across digital channels. I also oversee content optimization and marketing, ensuring our messaging aligns with audience needs and business goals.

One of my key contributions has been spearheading the Fincome Gold Loan Advisor project. From ideation to execution, I played a pivotal role in bootstrapping this initiative, including:

Designing intuitive user experiences and interfaces.

Developing and optimizing content to resonate with the target audience.

Collaborating with cross-functional teams on development, QA, and QC to ensure the platform's success.


This hands-on involvement has allowed me to deliver a project that aligns with SahiBandhu's vision of expanding its offerings while maintaining exceptional quality standards.

My experience here reflects my ability to lead teams, execute multifaceted projects, and drive growth in a competitive market.

experience.description_html:
At Designhill, I played a key role in driving the growth and visibility of two major offerings: the Custom Logo Design service and the AI Logo Maker Tool. My work primarily targeted the USA and Tier 1 countries, where I focused on optimizing the platform’s organic search presence and driving qualified traffic to increase conversions.

Key responsibilities and achievements include:

Parasite SEO Optimization: Implemented advanced strategies to leverage high-authority platforms and improve search rankings for Designhill’s custom logo design and AI logo maker tools.

SEO Audits & Optimization: Conducted thorough SEO audits and performed on-page and off-page optimizations, including keyword research, link building, and content marketing, leading to enhanced organic traffic and improved visibility.

B2B & B2C SEO: Developed and executed tailored SEO strategies for both B2B and B2C segments, optimizing user journeys and enhancing conversion rates.

Content Marketing & CMS Management: Managed content optimization and streamlined content creation workflows to align with SEO best practices.

Web Analytics & Landing Page Optimization: Utilized tools like Google Analytics, Ahrefs, Google Webmaster Tools, and SEM to analyze performance and optimize landing pages for improved user engagement and conversions.

Social Media & Reputation Management: Strengthened online reputation through proactive social media optimization (SMO) and off-page SEO strategies.

Growth Strategies & Link Building: Designed and implemented growth strategies, including link-building and content-driven campaigns, to support organic search growth and brand awareness.


My role at Designhill involved blending SEO, content, and digital marketing expertise to boost Designhill's presence in a competitive space, helping position the platform as a leader in custom logo design and AI-powered tools.

experience.title: Product Manager - Digital Lending
experience.description: As an Assistant Product Manager at the Manipal Group & Sahibandhu Fintech Services I have driven significant process improvements and innovation in the Gold Loan industry by designing an automated onboarding journey, reducing operational complexities, and enhancing risk mitigation measures.Key Contributions:Vendor Assessment & API Integration: Evaluated vendors and executed API integrations for OCR and document validation, eliminating manual verification and enabling seamless data capture and autofill within the sales application.Cross-functional Collaboration: Acted as a primary liaison between Sales, Operations, and Tech teams, facilitating alignment and comprehensive product documentation, including concept notes, business cases, and API criteria.Process Improvement & SOP Development: Spearheaded the formation of SOPs and process improvement initiatives within the product team, leveraging frameworks such as JTBD and Opportunity Analysis to enhance efficiency and drive value.Throughout my tenure, I have developed a strong foundation in product management, user-centric design, and data-driven decision-making. I am skilled in balancing operational efficiencies with customer satisfaction, ensuring robust and scalable solutions. My experiences have equipped me with the strategic insights and technical expertise required to drive product growth and customer success.
experience.description_html:
As an Assistant Product Manager at the Manipal Group & Sahibandhu Fintech Services I have driven significant process improvements and innovation in the Gold Loan industry by designing an automated onboarding journey, reducing operational complexities, and enhancing risk mitigation measures.

Key Contributions:

Vendor Assessment & API Integration: Evaluated vendors and executed API integrations for OCR and document validation, eliminating manual verification and enabling seamless data capture and autofill within the sales application.

Cross-functional Collaboration: Acted as a primary liaison between Sales, Operations, and Tech teams, facilitating alignment and comprehensive product documentation, including concept notes, business cases, and API criteria.

Process Improvement & SOP Development: Spearheaded the formation of SOPs and process improvement initiatives within the product team, leveraging frameworks such as JTBD and Opportunity Analysis to enhance efficiency and drive value.

Throughout my tenure, I have developed a strong foundation in product management, user-centric design, and data-driven decision-making. I am skilled in balancing operational efficiencies with customer satisfaction, ensuring robust and scalable solutions. My experiences have equipped me with the strategic insights and technical expertise required to drive product growth and customer success.

detailed_profile.position: Gold Loan | Manipal Fintech ( The Manipal Group ) | BFSI Growth Strategist | 14+ Yrs in Retail Lending & Sales | Ex- IndiaGold | Ex-HDFC
detailed_profile.about: Accomplished and results-oriented professional with over 14 years of experience in the banking and financial services industry, with core expertise in gold loans, retail lending, sales strategy, and regional operations management. Proven track record of delivering consistent business growth, driving process improvements, and leading high-performing teams across diverse markets. Currently Looking - Gold Loan Doorstep at Manipal Fintech ( The Manipal Group ), I lead the strategic rollout and expansion of the doorstep gold loan model, ensuring seamless customer experience, operational efficiency, and market penetration. I oversee end-to-end business operations, sales performance, compliance, and team development to scale the model across multiple geographies. My career spans leadership roles at prestigious organizations like IndiaGold ,HDFC Bank , Vodafone , Hewlett Packard , where I successfully managed large teams, developed high-impact business strategies, and executed customer-centric initiatives that enhanced revenue and retention. I bring a unique blend of traditional banking experience and fintech innovation, enabling organizations to stay agile and competitive in the evolving financial landscape. Key Expertise: ‚Ä¢ Doorstep Gold Loan Operations ‚Ä¢ Sales Leadership & Business Development ‚Ä¢ Retail Lending & Financial Services ‚Ä¢ Team Building & Performance Management ‚Ä¢ Regional Strategy & Execution ‚Ä¢ Customer Experience & Compliance I am passionate about leveraging technology to enhance financial inclusion and am committed to driving growth through strategic leadership and innovation.

experience.title: Regional Head
experience.description: Key Responsibilities as Regional Head:	‚Ä¢	Spearheading operations across Delhi NCR, Lucknow, and Indore for Gold Loan business, ensuring efficient management and growth.	‚Ä¢	Leading a high-performing team comprising 1 Cluster Head, 3 Area Cluster Heads, 4 Team Leaders, 30 Loan Managers, 4 Sales Managers, and 6 Sales Executives to achieve organizational objectives.	‚Ä¢	Driving business growth with a monthly turnover of ‚Çπ12 crore and maintaining an AUM of ‚Çπ6 crore, while ensuring compliance with operational standards.	‚Ä¢	Strategizing and implementing market-focused plans to identify growth opportunities, expand market presence, and enhance product reach.	‚Ä¢	Focusing on new customer acquisition and optimizing balance transfer (BT) cases to scale business performance.	‚Ä¢	Collaborating effectively with Direct Sales Agents (DSAs) to strengthen market penetration and boost loan disbursals through targeted initiatives.
experience.description_html:
Key Responsibilities as Regional Head:
• Spearheading operations across Delhi NCR, Lucknow, and Indore for Gold Loan business, ensuring efficient management and growth.
• Leading a high-performing team comprising 1 Cluster Head, 3 Area Cluster Heads, 4 Team Leaders, 30 Loan Managers, 4 Sales Managers, and 6 Sales Executives to achieve organizational objectives.
• Driving business growth with a monthly turnover of ₹12 crore and maintaining an AUM of ₹6 crore, while ensuring compliance with operational standards.
• Strategizing and implementing market-focused plans to identify growth opportunities, expand market presence, and enhance product reach.
• Focusing on new customer acquisition and optimizing balance transfer (BT) cases to scale business performance.
• Collaborating effectively with Direct Sales Agents (DSAs) to strengthen market penetration and boost loan disbursals through targeted initiatives.

positions.title: Area Head Consumer Loans at HDFC BANK
positions.description_html:
• Steering complete array of Business Development operations for promoting Installment Finance / Consumer Durable Loan Business across assigned region of Haryana, Delhi / NCR
• Heading and motivating a team of 100 Relationship Officers (RO’s) and 10 Sales Managers
• Managing Installment products ( Credit Card + Debit card + Consumer Durable EMI)
• Strategizing periodic business plans in coordination with key decision-makers of organization for revenue generation
• Conceptualizing and implement sales promotional activities with OEM's & LFR as a part of market development and increasing the share of CD/DC/CC financing
• Mentoring and training the sales force for better understanding of the product and optimum delivery on the field
• Identifying and onboarding competent channel partners; training & developing channel partner staff on new products; rolling-out channel-wide demand generation programs and tracking its results
• Developing cooperative advertising campaigns with distribution partners; identifying & implementing training needs of distribution partners
• Expanding partners’ sales, pre-sales and delivery capabilities in-line with designed strategy through consistent partner management; establishing and driving sales strategy, setting goals for distributors
• Formulating & implementing highly collaborative comprehensive strategy across areas and across the product lifecycle
• Cross selling & bundling of the entire suite of retail banking products for enhanced efficiencies.
• Leading teams, training & mentoring sales force for better understanding of the product and optimum delivery on the field

detailed_profile.about: As a Senior Product Designer at SahiBandhu, I create innovative and user-friendly web and mobile applications that address the needs and challenges of rural communities in India. I work with a cross-functional team of developers, researchers, and marketers to deliver solutions that are impactful, scalable, and sustainable. I have a Master of Computer Applications degree from JSS Academy of Technical Education, Noida, and a Bachelor of Computer Application degree from Avviare Education Hub. I also have a bit of knowledge of coding concepts in Java and PHP, which helps me to communicate effectively with the technical team and understand the feasibility and limitations of the design. I am passionate about product design and UI/UX, and I am always curious and eager to explore new things and learn new skills. I have multiple certifications and honors in design and entrepreneurship, and I have contributed to several successful projects at BuyUcoin and The DigiBee Network as a Lead Designer and an Assistant Manager Product Design and UI/UX Designer.

detailed_profile.about: As Head Center of Excellence at Manipal Fintech, I leverage my years of experience in Digital strategy & transformation, operations and business management to drive growth and innovation in the fintech industry. I hold a Bachelor of Commerce degree from Calcutta University and a Certified ScrumMaster¬Æ certification from Scrum Alliance, ISO 9001 certified Internal Auditor & 6 Sigma Green Belt certifications, demonstrating my commitment to continuous learning and improvement. I have a proven track record of leading cross-functional teams, implementing agile methodologies, and delivering high-quality results. My skills in digital strategy, scrum, and agile methodologies enable me to navigate complex challenges and opportunities in the dynamic fintech landscape. I am passionate about creating value for customers, stakeholders, and the organization as a whole.

detailed_profile.name: Saurabh Jha
detailed_profile.position: Human Resources Professional | Driving People & Process Excellence | Passionate About Building Engaged, Productive Workforces
detailed_profile.about: As a seasoned Human Resources Professional with over a decade of experience, I have dedicated my career to fostering inclusive, dynamic, and productive work environments. My expertise spans across HR Business Partner (HRBP) operations, Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) initiatives, recruitment, policy development, team leadership, change management, performance management systems (PMS), and compliance. Throughout my career, I have consistently demonstrated a passion for people and a commitment to driving organizational success through strategic HR practices. I excel in building strong, engaged teams and implementing innovative HR solutions that align with business objectives. Key Highlights: HRBP Operations: Proven track record in aligning HR strategies with business goals to enhance organizational performance. DEI Initiatives: Deeply committed to promoting diversity, equity, and inclusion to create a more equitable workplace. Recruitment: Skilled in attracting, hiring, and retaining top talent across various industries. Policy Development: Expertise in crafting and implementing HR policies that support company culture and compliance. Team Handling: Strong leadership abilities with experience in managing and developing high-performing teams. Change Management: Adept at guiding organizations through change, ensuring smooth transitions and minimal disruption. Performance Management: Proficient in designing and executing effective performance management systems. Compliance: Thorough understanding of HR compliance and regulatory requirements to mitigate risks. My approach is centered on the belief that a happy and engaged workforce is the cornerstone of any successful organization. I am passionate about creating workplaces where employees feel valued, supported, and motivated to contribute their best. Let's connect and explore how I can help your organization achieve its HR goals and drive continuous improvement.

detailed_profile.name: Saurabh Jha
detailed_profile.position: Human Resources Professional | Driving People & Process Excellence | Passionate About Building Engaged, Productive Workforces
detailed_profile.about: As a seasoned Human Resources Professional with over a decade of experience, I have dedicated my career to fostering inclusive, dynamic, and productive work environments. My expertise spans across HR Business Partner (HRBP) operations, Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) initiatives, recruitment, policy development, team leadership, change management, performance management systems (PMS), and compliance. Throughout my career, I have consistently demonstrated a passion for people and a commitment to driving organizational success through strategic HR practices. I excel in building strong, engaged teams and implementing innovative HR solutions that align with business objectives. Key Highlights: HRBP Operations: Proven track record in aligning HR strategies with business goals to enhance organizational performance. DEI Initiatives: Deeply committed to promoting diversity, equity, and inclusion to create a more equitable workplace. Recruitment: Skilled in attracting, hiring, and retaining top talent across various industries. Policy Development: Expertise in crafting and implementing HR policies that support company culture and compliance. Team Handling: Strong leadership abilities with experience in managing and developing high-performing teams. Change Management: Adept at guiding organizations through change, ensuring smooth transitions and minimal disruption. Performance Management: Proficient in designing and executing effective performance management systems. Compliance: Thorough understanding of HR compliance and regulatory requirements to mitigate risks. My approach is centered on the belief that a happy and engaged workforce is the cornerstone of any successful organization. I am passionate about creating workplaces where employees feel valued, supported, and motivated to contribute their best. Let's connect and explore how I can help your organization achieve its HR goals and drive continuous improvement.

detailed_profile.about: I‚Äôm a Lead Full Stack Developer and Solution Architect with 6+ years of experience building scalable, secure, and user-centric platforms in the fintech space. I specialize in full-stack development using Java, Spring Boot, and React, with a strong focus on system design and microservices architecture. My work has spanned across building identity frameworks, secure device authorization systems, geolocation tracking for mobile platforms, and CRM integrations ‚Äî all designed to improve performance, compliance, and user experience at scale. I thrive in cross-functional environments where technology meets business outcomes. Whether mentoring teams, collaborating with product managers, or delivering under pressure, I bring a deep sense of ownership, architectural thinking, and delivery accountability to every project.

My goal is to contribute to organizational growth by establishing and optimizing digital marketing strategies, processes, and teams. I possess the ability to effectively manage and lead a team, as well as adapt to changing circumstances. I excel in communication, working collaboratively within a team, and demonstrating strong problem-solving skills. Furthermore, I have an insatiable curiosity that drives me to continuously learn and acquire knowledge for personal growth. Guiding and assisting candidates throughout their training program. Managing database of old and new enquiries, both offline & online, globally.2. Corporate  Team  building  ‚Äì  Planning,  organizing  and  conducting  Corporate  Team  Building events, both Offsite and In-house training.3. experience.description_html:
1. Client Relationship Management – One to one counselling of candidates, understanding the requirements and recommending courses as per their profiles. Guiding and assisting candidates throughout their training program. Managing database of old and new enquiries, both offline & online, globally.
2. Corporate Team building – Planning, organizing and conducting Corporate Team Building events, both Offsite and In-house training.
3. Business Promotion and Office Administration – Increased business presence over various online and offline platforms, social media, etc and designing marketing products for business promotion. Managing the administration of the office.

experience.title: Talent Acquisition Recruiter
experience.description: 1. Campus Hiring ‚Äì Visiting various campuses across India (Tech & Non-Tech) and hiring candidates by conducting the interviews and coordinating with their respective placement cells, third parties and internal teams.2. Contract Hiring ‚Äì Shortlisting candidates from resumes received from third party vendors by conducting various tests and arranging their interviews to hire them for specific assignments.3. End-to-end management ‚Äì Responsible for coordinating the entire recruitment process, like welcome calls to all applicants prior to scheduled start dates, background variance resolution, reference checks, data entry, scheduling interviews (phone, Skype, On-site), organizing candidate travel arrangements, reserving conference rooms and internal/external reporting. This also involved working with multiple teams simultaneously.3. Interviewers‚Äô Panel Management ‚Äì Follow-ups & replacements on non-availability and employee induction process to induct them as independent interviewers.4. Events & Drives ‚Äì Manage scheduling for interview loops and other related activities.
experience.description_html:
1. Campus Hiring – Visiting various campuses across India (Tech & Non-Tech) and hiring candidates by conducting the interviews and coordinating with their respective placement cells, third parties and internal teams.
2. Contract Hiring – Shortlisting candidates from resumes received from third party vendors by conducting various tests and arranging their interviews to hire them for specific assignments.
3. End-to-end management – Responsible for coordinating the entire recruitment process, like welcome calls to all applicants prior to scheduled start dates, background variance resolution, reference checks, data entry, scheduling interviews (phone, Skype, On-site), organizing candidate travel arrangements, reserving conference rooms and internal/external reporting. This also involved working with multiple teams simultaneously.
3. Interviewers’ Panel Management – Follow-ups & replacements on non-availability and employee induction process to induct them as independent interviewers.
4. Events & Drives – Manage scheduling for interview loops and other related activities.

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: As a seasoned Gold Loan Product Manager, I have successfully driven multiple initiatives to enhance product offerings and streamline operational processes. My expertise lies in developing and integrating robust systems that improve efficiency and customer experience.Key Responsibilities and Achievements:-Commission Engine Development :Spearheaded the development & implementation of a sophisticated commission engine, ensuring accurate and timely calculations of commission payments for sales teams.- Internal Document Verification Portal:Led the creation of an internal document verification portal that streamlined the loan approval process. This reduced verification time by 40%, improving overall customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.- CRM Integration:Successfully integrated a Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system to centralize customer data and streamline communication. This integration facilitated better customer insights and more personalized service offerings.- Vendor Management & Agreement Signing:Managed vendor relationships and negotiated agreements to ensure the highest quality services and favorable terms. - Ticketing Tool Integration:Implemented a ticketing tool for better issue tracking and resolution management. This integration improved response times by 30% and provided valuable data for continuous process improvement.
experience.description_html:
As a seasoned Gold Loan Product Manager, I have successfully driven multiple initiatives to enhance product offerings and streamline operational processes. My expertise lies in developing and integrating robust systems that improve efficiency and customer experience.

Key Responsibilities and Achievements:

-Commission Engine Development :Spearheaded the development & implementation of a sophisticated commission engine, ensuring accurate and timely calculations of commission payments for sales teams.

- Internal Document Verification Portal:Led the creation of an internal document verification portal that streamlined the loan approval process. This reduced verification time by 40%, improving overall customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.

- CRM Integration:Successfully integrated a Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system to centralize customer data and streamline communication. This integration facilitated better customer insights and more personalized service offerings.

- Vendor Management & Agreement Signing:Managed vendor relationships and negotiated agreements to ensure the highest quality services and favorable terms.

- Ticketing Tool Integration:Implemented a ticketing tool for better issue tracking and resolution management. This integration improved response times by 30% and provided valuable data for continuous process improvement.

projects.title: NYC Taxi and Limousine Commission Data Analysis
projects.description: ‚Ä¢ Analyzed over 2 million lines of data to determine underlying patterns affecting fare and tip amount of customers.‚Ä¢ Performed EDA to isolate the 4 most correlated variables and conducted t-tests to confirm the hypothesis via significance level.‚Ä¢ Built a linear regression model to uncover the factors affecting trips and customer reviews with an accuracy of 83.6%.‚Ä¢ Engineered a prediction machine learning model with random forest and xgb boost to get an accuracy of 67.2%.

projects.title: Z Unlocked Challenge by HP
projects.description: ‚Ä¢ Task 1 (Data Viz) - Wrangled land cover, forest fire, waste disposal, temperature change, and energy emissions data to visualize global deforestation patterns across the world.‚Ä¢ Task 2 (NLP) - Augmented a machine learning model using nltk, wordcloud, gensim to scour the internet via keyword extraction and implemented LDA - Latent Dirichlet Allocation to uncover distribution of topics at an accuracy of 74.2%.‚Ä¢ Task 3 (Audio Classifier) - Constructed a tensorflow/keras model using pydub to analyze sound recordings of capuchin birds and predicted forest areas with the greatest density of the species with 78.4% accuracy.‚Ä¢ Task 4 (Image Classifier) - Applied CNN and transfer learning model using opencv to train the model on stored images and classified similar kinds of images on the internet with an acc. of 84%.

projects.title: Time Series Forecasting for Olist Brazil
projects.description: ‚Ä¢ Developed a time-series forecasting model using the ARIMA technique to analyze and predict future sales trends for various product categories available in Olist Superstore in Brazil.‚Ä¢ Leveraged historical sales data to identify trends in the time series over 4 years of data and predict the future sales outcome with 76% accuracy.‚Ä¢ Uncovered underlying patterns and seasonal variations in sales data using Tableau and Seaborn, providing valuable insights into consumer behavior for future sales, and enabling informed decision-making.

HR professionals act as strategic partners, supporting business objectives by managing the employee lifecycle, fostering a positive work environment, and promoting employee engagement. We also play a vital role in shaping company culture and driving organizational effectiveness. HR roles can vary based on company size, industry, and specific needs, with specializations in areas like talent acquisition or HR business partnering.

basic_info.name: T.R.Nagendra Rao - EVP & Chief Growth Officer.
basic_info.search_snippet: Mr. Rao has been part of Manipal Technologies Limited's (MTL) transformational journey for the last 33 years and has contributed to the company's strategy and ...

detailed_profile.name: T.R.Nagendra Rao
detailed_profile.position: EVP & Chief Growth Officer.
detailed_profile.about: A customer-centric leader with a passion for growing sales through everlasting relationships with customers. Mr. Rao has been part of Manipal Technologies Limited's (MTL) transformational journey for the last 33 years and has contributed to the company's strategy and exponential business growth. Currently, he is heading the Sales and Integrated Account Management department. Being passionate about delivering customer experience, Mr. Rao introduced the integrated account management function in 2021. Today, he leads a team of relationship managers and delivers value for premium customers by identifying problems, offering creative solutions, and helping them achieve their digital transformational goals. Currently, he is leading all strategic accounts for MTL and its subsidiary companies. Before this, Mr. Rao was leading the sales & marketing department. With his customer engagement and insight into industry developments, he helped the company move into data printing which helped to grow the secure solutions business. He played a key role in the recharge vouchers business helping the telecom companies to take the pre-paid mobile to the masses. Mr. Rao played a critical role in expanding the book business and aiding the company to become the largest book printing company in India, catering to all major publishers. Mr. Rao played a key role in expanding the cards business in India. His strong customer relationships helped in identifying the opportunities in plastic cards. Mr. Rao holds a B.E degree in Mechanical Engineering from Karnataka University, Dharwad. He is an active participant in industry forums and events and started the initiative for MTL to participate in international events. In his leisure time, Mr. Rao enjoys reading books.

positions.subtitle: Manipal Technologies Limited
positions.description: Manipal Technologies Limited (MTL) is part of The Manipal Group, a USD 2 billion multinational conglomerate headquartered in Manipal, Karnataka. Established in 1941 with a vision to create lasting impressions, MTL today is one of the fastest-growing companies transforming billions of lives worldwide.MTL has been a relentless innovator for the last 80 years and today leading player in diverse businesses from fintech, financial inclusion, payments, doorstep banking, enterprise fraud management suite to gold loans, digital media, e-learning, e-commerce, print management, cards, commercial print, secure solutions, and others.MTL has four R&D centers that filed 28 patents for various technology areas and recently rolled out new-age products related to virtual cards, metal cards, and wearable payments.Today, MTL is a trusted partner for leading banks, insurance, telecom, publishing, retail, education, and many global brands across diverse industries for its cutting-edge future-ready products and services. In addition, a partner of choice for many mission-critical solutions for the Government of India.MTL house of brands including MBS, SahiPay, SahiBandhu, CrossFraud, MDS, GetMiClass, MCT Cards, and Breoss continues making a positive impact on society. Every day more than twenty-three million customers use MTLs enterprise platform and every second more than $35 is withdrawn using the SahiPay device. Also, more than four billion+ transactions are protected using our fraud management software based on artificial intelligence.MTL's footprint spread across Germany, Kenya, and Nigeria to support its local customer needs. The trust and support of a large global client base.MTL's success is driven by its strong value system and innovation-led ecosystem. The company provides a safe, respectful, innovative, and vibrant work environment to more than 5000 employees, who are driving the change.
positions.title: Vice President Sales and Marketing
positions.description_html:
Manipal Technologies Limited (MTL) is part of The Manipal Group, a USD 2 billion multinational conglomerate headquartered in Manipal, Karnataka. Established in 1941 with a vision to create lasting impressions, MTL today is one of the fastest-growing companies transforming billions of lives worldwide.



MTL has been a relentless innovator for the last 80 years and today leading player in diverse businesses from fintech, financial inclusion, payments, doorstep banking, enterprise fraud management suite to gold loans, digital media, e-learning, e-commerce, print management, cards, commercial print, secure solutions, and others.
MTL has four R&D centers that filed 28 patents for various technology areas and recently rolled out new-age products related to virtual cards, metal cards, and wearable payments.



Today, MTL is a trusted partner for leading banks, insurance, telecom, publishing, retail, education, and many global brands across diverse industries for its cutting-edge future-ready products and services. In addition, a partner of choice for many mission-critical solutions for the Government of India.



MTL house of brands including MBS, SahiPay, SahiBandhu, CrossFraud, MDS, GetMiClass, MCT Cards, and Breoss continues making a positive impact on society. Every day more than twenty-three million customers use MTLs enterprise platform and every second more than $35 is withdrawn using the SahiPay device. Also, more than four billion+ transactions are protected using our fraud management software based on artificial intelligence.



MTL's footprint spread across Germany, Kenya, and Nigeria to support its local customer needs. The trust and support of a large global client base.
MTL's success is driven by its strong value system and innovation-led ecosystem. The company provides a safe, respectful, innovative, and vibrant work environment to more than 5000 employees, who are driving the change.

positions.title: Strategic Assistant to the CEO
positions.description_html:
In this role, I report to the CEO and work closely with the Executive Management Team in defining and executing business strategy for the Manipal Group's Home Fragrance business.

Specific responsibilities include:
- Enabling implementation of business strategy by liaising with function heads and various program leaders.
- Ensuring that strategic initiatives maintain momentum, are tracked and followed-up to completion.
- Identification of leading indicators affecting business performance in near term and long term. Partnering with the functional heads in analyzing the trends and coordinating development of action plan.
- Ensuring cross-functional accountability for execution against objectives, identify critical issues and facilitate discussion in cross-functional forums to drive systemic resolution of issues.
- Leading and executing special projects for CEO
- Coordinating CEO reviews and participating in organizational reviews with senior management.
- Be a thought partner to the Executive Management Team in analysing industry trends, competitive actions and regulatory environment, and participate in defining company's response to external influences.

experience.description_html:
 Plan and execute the project in a safe and timely manner as per schedule.
 Study the 3D assembly as well 2D detail drawings issued by the design team.
 Provide guidance to trainees and manufacturing teams.
 Participate in design review meetings.
 Daily CNC load planning, study drawings and prepare MFG process.
 Prepare control chart with target dates.
 Decide tools for P1, P2, P3, Review with MFG team and feeding.
 Micro schedule preparation and schedule update.
 Preparation of actuals (MFG, TRYOUT, CNC), as per monthly plan.
 Detail drawing vendorisation (small/minute materials).
 Progress photo updating and send reports to the customer every week.
 Preparation of wire cut list and segregation of heat treatment jobs in ordered items.
 Preparation of CNC operation sheets for both inhouse and outsourced jobs.
 Checking the BOM data from output and prepare BOM summary.
 Daily update of IML and after inspection send it to the manufacturing department.
 Also, send job to CMM for zero stock material.
 Take initiatives and ensure to receive all die parts on time upon product completion.
